identity.mission: Create a high-end 'Control Room' aesthetic for the admin panel and a 'Fintech/High-Tech' feel for the public site. Avoid generic SaaS templates.

grid_system.public: Tetris Grid (Grid Cols 12 with asymmetric spans)

buttons.primary: bg-blue-600 hover:bg-blue-500 text-white rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-medium transition-all shadow-[0_0_20px_rgba(37,99,235,0.3)] hover:shadow-[0_0_30px_rgba(37,99,235,0.5)]
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-white/20 text-white hover:bg-white/5 rounded-full px-8 py-3 transition-all
buttons.ghost: text-slate-300 hover:text-white hover:bg-white/5 rounded-lg px-4 py-2

cards.pricing: relative overflow-hidden bg-slate-900/50 border border-white/10 rounded-3xl p-8 hover:border-blue-500/50 transition-colors group
cards.feature: bg-slate-900/30 border border-white/5 rounded-2xl p-6 hover:bg-slate-900/50 transition-all
cards.pbn_item: flex flex-col bg-slate-950 border border-white/10 rounded-xl overflow-hidden hover:shadow-xl transition-shadow

inputs.default: bg-slate-950/50 border-white/10 focus:border-blue-500 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-blue-500 rounded-lg h-12 px-4 text-white placeholder:text-slate-500

visual_enhancers.glow_effects: Use colored shadows (shadow-blue-500/20) instead of black shadows for depth in dark mode.

hero_bg.usage: Hero section background with heavy overlay (bg-slate-950/90)

infrastructure.usage: PBN Network section or 'Why Choose Us' background

team.usage: About Us page or Trust section

general: Implement Dark Mode ONLY. Do not build a light mode toggle unless explicitly asked later.
Use 'Poppins' for all Headings and 'Inter' for body text.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast against the dark background (min 4.5:1).
Use the 'Royal Blue' (#2563eb) sparingly for high-impact CTAs and active states.
For the Admin Panel, prioritize density and data visibility ('Control Room' aesthetic).

specific_pages.home: Hero section must be immersive. Use the 'Digital Network' image with a gradient overlay. Feature the 'Packages' prominently using the 'Tracing Beam' card style.
specific_pages.pbn_list: Use a dense table or grid layout. Hide actual domains (e.g., 'Domain #123'). Use badges for metrics (DA, PA, TF).
specific_pages.blog: Clean, readable typography. Max-width 65ch for article content.
specific_pages.admin: Sidebar navigation. Dashboard with summary cards (Total Sites, Active Orders). Use Shadcn Table for data management.

components: Customize Shadcn components to match the dark/royal blue theme.
Ensure the 'Order via WhatsApp' button is floating and visible on mobile.

universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts. Use asymmetry where possible.
Add micro-interactions to every button and card (hover lift, glow, border color change).
Never use pure black (#000000) for backgrounds; use tinted blacks (#020617).
Images must be lazy-loaded and optimized.
